name: Kahayana Suites
address: Jl. A.A. Gede Rai, Lodtunduh, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1: Very friendly staff and very cozy place. Happy to choose this hotel for vacation. Have a wonderful pool in the middle. De Topaz restaurant is nearby and delicious foods they have. Rooms are very clean. Only thing you need a vehicle to go somewhere little distance from center but this is not a problem they have good offers for motorcycles. Quiet and peaceful ‚úåüèª.
review 2: Lovely small hotel. The staff are very friendly and nothing is too much trouble. Rooms are excellent. The gardens are beautiful and it is very peaceful. The restaurant provides good service and food. You will need transport as the hotel is about 15 mins ( make that 20-30mins if traffic is bad and you are in a car).
review 3:
This was our favorite stay in Ubud!
It is a bit outside Ubud, but then makes it easier to visit nature in the north.
The place is super new, clean and staff is amazing. So accomodating and make you feel at home.
They have done a good job in preserving the nature around and integrating, so the whole place feels very calming and inviting.
Absolutely reccomend this place!
Much love from Aladin & Aldina
review 4: Pretty nice hotel. Everything is clean. The lobby is big with nice touch. The room is facing the pool and several rooms have direct access to pool. The pool is long and quite big for the guests. There are day beds and chairs provided by the pool. The staffs are super nice. The lady in the reception and the man who help us bring our luggages are super friendly and dedicated. They have ala carte breakfast that you can choose 1 day in advance. It is located in the topaz cafe just right in front of the hotel. We really enjoy our time here. It takes around 20 minutes to downtown ubud
review 5:
I definitely have a pleasant stay here. Drive here from airport took around 1 hour time. Found it tucked in a little alley, yet still spacious enough for cars to get into.
The ambience is lovely, their lounge area is relaxing and the hotel property is facing its cafe / breakfast area. We also had great time in their 15x4 sqm area pool.
Service is top notch, they treated all guests with same standard, polite & friendly. They also gave us some travel tips for our next trip.
Option for breakfast is indeed limited but we thoroughly enjoyed it, especially the fresh veggies & omelette. Go try local dish for breakfast, way better than just bread & jam üòâüëå
Room is pretty comfortable for our stay. Mind you this is not a 5 star property, but it has everything you need for. Bed was super comfortable. Improvement can be done for shower/ toilet as we need to fully turn the exhaust on to prevent any damp smell.
Overall still a 5/5 experience ü§ç

name: Canvas Escape
address: Jl. A.A. Gede Rai No.21, Lodtunduh, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1:
We had an amazing experience at this accommodation.

Staff were super friendly and helpful. Really enjoyed the room we were in and also enjoyed the breakfast in the morning. Able to rent a motorbike to explore ubud‚Äôs hidden gems. The center is a 20 minute ride but with traffic i would say 30 minutes more or less. The bed is comfortable and the airconditioning works well. The bath looks beautiful but there is not enough hot water to fill it up and the plug doesn‚Äôt fit very well. The shower how ever is really nice.

We were super happy! Thank you so much for everything.
review 2: Really nice and clean houses combined with luxury. Also the workers are very nice. Forgot my phone at the villa and got contacted emidiatly that it was there in a safety box. So 5 stars overall. ( and food very nice üòâ )
review 3:
Me and wife had a wonderful experience staying at Canvas Escape resort. The rooms were cozy, the beds were very comfortable and there was a smart tv in the room. Upon our arrival, the staff were nothing but amazing. The resort ambiance was wonderful and gave us a sense of glamping and was away from the noise of the streets.  The delicious breakfast was included daily, and  it was a variety of items to choose from on the menu. The Villa also gave us the option to have breakfast delivered to our room. Additionally, for New Year‚Äôs Eve, the staff gifted us with a thoughtful NYE gift which was so nice! Furthermore we booked a massage through the villa and the masseuses were amazing. One of the best massages me and my wife had!

Some of the cons we noticed were the ants in the bathroom and the noise of the roosters outside in the garden in the early mornings. We had a lizard in our bathroom that paid frequent visits, however, the staff was very swift to get it out.

I get all we would recommend Canvas Escape to anyone vacationing in Ubud, Bali
review 4: Excellent place in Ubud.. so calm.. so romantic.. nice pool.. better to bring food outside if you want to eat late night as the hotel takes last order by 7:00pm apart from that it‚Äôs a very great place to stay and enjoy the resort.. we were there 5 days and no trouble at all..
review 5: Property is very good. Good for couple getaway. Staff is very friendly and caring. We did have few small issues like shower gel was not coming out, room lock was getting stuck but when we asked staff they immediately resolved it. Pool area is ok-ish. Bathrooms are just wow, definitely amazing for couples. Everyday staff asked for bf menu and even they prepared early bf boxes for us as we had to travel early that day. Stay is a bit outside of ubud market but with the price we paid it was good stay overall

name: Capital O 90654 Pondok Wisata Buana Amerta
address: Lodtunduh, Ubud, Bali, 80571, Indonesia
review 1:
Ok the price was so cheap when I book with Agoda. However I think it's not worth it coz the room is not clean. The bathroom is so messy and it seems not well managed.
The only good point of this hotel is it's located in good location not too far from Ubud.
There's only 1 staff to maintain the hotel and handle customers, so I can understand why it's so messy.
I think better to avoid this hotel if you're looking for a comfortable hotel to stay.
review 2: This place is very recommended for you who search for comfortable stays with affordable price. The building is new, the room is spacious and comfortable, with AC and hot water shower.  They provide towel, shampoo and soap as well. The staff is friendly and helpful. It's close to Monkey Forest and other tourism object in Ubud. We enjoyed our stays here.
review 3: Building seems new, not much of a view, but very quiet at night despite facing the road. 20mins motorbike ride to Monkey Forest. Hot water TV and aircon working well. Would have been nicer if they provide somewhere to hang clothes and wet towel. Plenty of parking for motorbike. But not sure why, nobody at check-out in the morning.
review 4:
Absolutely horrible experience with the most Arrogant staff. Super dirty. Pee on the sheets and dirty toilet. Cold water on the shower. Please do not book here. It was terrible.
Horrible.
review 5: Nice, clean and friendly staff. Bed and bath only ,,, just what we need and very economical.

name: Casa D'Sami Ubud
address: C7V6+MH7, Jl. A.A. Gede Rai, Lodtunduh, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1:
Sami! Thank you for everything!
The services is amazing, Sami is a good and wise man with beautiful vibes, he speaks several languages, he will help you and he will have the answer about every kind of curiosity you have about this amazing island.
Tasty Breakfast and beautiful quite garden with pool.
Sami will give you the possibility to wear tipical Balinese clothes and he will take you pictures (he is also a photographer!)
The position is good and you can rent easily the scooter if you need it.
We highly recommend this placeü•∞
review 2: The best accommodation in Ubud on a budget. Sammy the owner is the loveliest person makes you feel like home. Amazing breakfast included, comfortable bed, WiFi and swimming pool. So recommend! üòå
review 3: Sami is The best host ever! The place is amazing, Sami and his nieces are lovely and The area is super peaceful. Sami was so amazing that he took us to the wedding ceremony which was a once in a lifetime experience. Thank you so much Sami! Can‚Äôt wait to be back soon üôè
review 4: Recently stayed to this homestay hosted by Sami, and the experience exceeded my expectations. Sami's hospitality was exceptional, going above and beyond to ensure a comfortable stay. From personalized recommendations to thoughtful gestures, it was evident that Sami genuinely cared about making my time enjoyable. The homestay itself was cozy and well-maintained, providing a homey atmosphere. I highly recommend Sami's place for a warm and welcoming accommodation experience.
review 5: Excellent place to stay. The pool is super clean and refreshing, rooms are clean with great A/C and hot/cold water. The breakfasts are delicious. Just outside of the main strip of Ubud so there‚Äôs not very much traffic or noise. Scooter rentals through them were very easy and cheap. Sami (owner) and his staff are incredibly kind, helpful and hardworking. Sami is very well respected in the local community and for good reason. He cares so much about preserving Balinese culture and sharing it with his guests. Stay here if you are visiting Ubud. Thanks Sami!

name: Ilalang Villas
address: Jl. A.A. Gede Rai Banjar Silungan, Lodtunduh, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1: Super Duper worth for money! The room is clean, with a pool view. There are only 4 rooms in total, thus the pool won't be crowded. In fact throughout my stay, we had the pool for ourselves. We had a lovely host with a great hospitality. This property is located in Lodtunduh, 20 mins away from City Centre, thus you need a taxi or bike rental to move around. Very quiet, peaceful and serene environment. It comes with breakfast and an option to upgrade to floating breakfast with a very minimal fee.
review 2: Definitely recommend this place in Ubud to stay. These 4 villas are such a hidden gem with a pool view. The beautiful and well-maintained villa looks great as seen in the picture, very clean and cozy. The staff was polite and friendly. The breakfast was tasty and fulfilling. We were happy to stay here for 3 nights. Thank you so much Wayan!
review 3: We enjoyed our stay. The room was really clean and we liked the outdoor shower! Excellent communication and the staff are super friendly. They also offer floating breakfast (additional 100k) but we couldn‚Äôt do it because it was raining on our last day there. The only thing that can be improved is the lighting in the room, it is a bit difficult for girls to do makeup.
review 4: The room is great and very clean. There are only 4 rooms so it realy quite. The swimming pool is also nice. The location is not far from central ubud but it cannot reach by walk. You can rent the motorcycle for Rp. 75k. The owner of the villa is very nice. They also provide simple breakfast. We choose fried rice and banana pancake which was very good.
review 5: The villa area was beautifully set out and all villas had a nice view of the pool which had a relaxing waterfall. The staff were very friendly and helpful.  Internet worked well and breakfast was good! Thank you for a nice stay üòä

name: Bamboo Ubud
address: Jl. A.A. Gede Rai No.50, Lodtunduh, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1: The host was very friendly, the place is super peaceful and lovely, they cleaned the room and they have food to order also.
review 2: Upon arriving at the location, we are not expecting ourselves to walk the narrow street to get into location. If it is not because of awesome service from Mb Tri who hosting us,I think I might give the experience below 3 stars overall. The room is as what it shown during the booking, but we are not expecting the toilet will not have bidet, since we are traveling still within Indonesia. I think the location will be great for people who looking for serenity and travel without luggages (i.e. backpacking). Recommended not driving car while staying here since the parking area is very limited and being shared by other houses around.
review 3:
This is a beautiful hotel, a real hidden gem. Go here for a quiet and relaxing stay. For those who are less familiar with nature you may find some ants here and there, as well as a cockroach on occasion. This is not due to lack of cleanliness, but being in an indoor outdoor space. The bed is very comfortable, internet is fast, A/C is cold, and at night it is so peaceful. The bathroom is huge, the bedroom is a little smaller than I would prefer only because we had a lot of luggage. The pool is cold at night, so I would only recommend to swim during the day. You may need to skim the pool with the net nearby, otherwise it is very clean. The host is incredibly sweet, kind, and speaks very good English. Laundry service is cheap too, very good service. Clean clothes within 24 hours. :)

These are very honest people, and this mini hotel is beautiful. Do not expect perfection, but expect a habit that allows relaxation.

The only thing I would change is a small dusting job, and some non see through curtains on the first floor rooms so people cannot see me nude. ;)
review 4: Indeed secluded area, nice view, you might able to go shooting stars behind the paddy fields. The swimming is murky, I don‚Äôt see anyone dipping inside. A little bit dusty, cleanliness can be improved, some ants nest in the bathroom. Far away from busy streets. Foods take a little bit longer than usual to prepare. I don‚Äôt recommend eating here. Overall, it‚Äôs a pleasant stay. Recommended.
review 5: Host was very helpful and provided everything we need from laundry services to motorbikes. Great value for money and very peaceful location.

name: Anulekha Resort & Villa
address: Banjar Silungan, Desa Lodtunduh, C7R7+96R, Ubud, Lodtunduh, Kec. Gianyar, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1: A small but luxurious resort. Everything you need to feel at home and comfortable. Air conditioned beautiful rooms, serviced daily. The pool is not large but kept clean and perfectly adequate to cool off in. Excellent restaurant with a wide variety on the menu. Staff are friendly and always smiling and welcoming. Appropriately priced. A perfect vacation.
review 2:
The resort is nestled to one side of a vast rice field affording pleasant views.

The room was serviceable for the price we paid for them.

The checking-in process took an excruciatingly long time. And when we were finally shown to our room, they realized the power to the room wasn't working. We were made to wait another 20 to 30 minutes before we could get the room.

The staff were friendly and courteous enough.

There is a little bike park near the entrance in case you're bringing a rented scooter.
review 3: Nestled amongst beautiful surroundings our villa was a haven. So peaceful and relaxing. Traditional open plan layout with a modern feel. Pool was perfect size for our family of five. Restaurant food was fantastic. Service also wonderful. Free shuttle bus to Ubud which is approx 15 mins away. Only negatives was lacking in kitchen equipment such as crockery and basic appliances. Also the sofa needed to be replaced as it wasn't very comfortable and quite dirty. Decking also needs to be replaced around the pool as warped. Beds and bathrooms lovely. All in all a wonderful place to stay üòä
review 4:
Stayed two nights in a private villa, the  villa was great, and the staff were great.
The floating breakfast is a must and a unique way to enjoy your private pool.

Place is a little too far away from anything, but they run a shuttle which is good.
review 5: Best place for a weekend gateway with family and friends. This resort is very spacious and well divided into studio rooms, deluxe rooms and private pool villas. I stayed here for 3 nights in private villa. It was an amazing experience staying there. In house restaurant offers variety of menu with covering local as well as international cuisine with some lip smacking cocktails. Service here is very prompt and they have so much to offer. The only thing concerned me about this place is that you will get company of so many lizards.

name: Villa Alang Alang
address: C7V5+9XG, Lodtunduh, Ubud, Gianyar Regency, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1: We had a long stay at Villa Alang Alang and it's now become part of us. It's a beautiful, ornate jogolo villa set back on a peaceful road away from the buzz of Ubud. Communication with the owners was always great and we found friends amongst the neighbours. You have a great 10m pool, atmospheric outside bathrooms and a well equipped kitchen. The villa manager Komang was the most helpful we've had in Bali and we'd thoroughly recommend a stay here!
review 2:
Amazing stay at Alang Alang and Koman was really nice! He helped us renting the motorbikes and we had a super tasty breakfast every morning in the villa! The place is beautiful and perfect for 2 couples. It's really comfortable and private! As soon as you wake up you can go straight to the swimming pool! There is also the washing machine.
Definitely worth it.
review 3: Great place to stay in a quite and peaceful suburb of Ubud. Really enjoying the set up of the villa, comfort is the rooms and service by hosts.

name: de'TOPAZ Cafe Ubud
address: Jl. A.A. Gede Rai, Lodtunduh, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1:
This place is absolutely lovely, I only came across this restaurant due to staying in the area and it was only a short walk away, but me and my partner have visited for both lunch and dinner mostly every day, the food has been incredible and hasn‚Äôt disappointed us!
We loved it very much and the staff were the most kindest people too.
Thank you for having us mostly every day we will see you soon.

Sophie & Max x ü´∂üèªü´∂üèª
review 2: it is located as part of kahayana suites in ubud. All the foods that we tried are delicious, same with the deserts. The service is super nice. They have live music at friday night. The ambiance is calming and relaxing
review 3: it's a wonderful restaurant in a great location. The service is great and there is a lot to choose from. We personally were very impressed by this, as there is a huge selection of dishes here. The restaurant is about 100 m off the street and therefore has a quiet and nice atmosphere. As usual, the Bales Niche service staff are simply great and very accommodating. You can recommend the restaurant with a clear conscience, just give it a try. ‚úÖüëç
review 4: We are extremely surprised by the beauty of this place, the quality and the taste of the foods and above all the kindness of the staff! In particular to the owner and to Made who took care of us from the beginning until the end with a smile, politeness, humor and all his kindness! thank you very much for this delicious meal we have rarely eaten so well! we will be back very very soon!
review 5: The waitress asked the order 4 times, it's tiring. There is no view of the fields, there are roosters crowing. I won't come a second time.

name: Melati Homestay
address: Gg. Melati Jl. Silungan No.Br, Lodtunduh, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia

name: Babi guling Luh mika
address: C7V6+2M8, Jl. A.A. Gede Rai, Lodtunduh, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1: Fabulous authentic Babi Guling served by friendly helpful staff.  Absolutely delicious.

name: junhouse
address: C7V6+73J, Lodtunduh, Ubud, Gianyar Regency, Bali 80571, Indonesia

name: Villa Mana
address: C7V6+62P, Gg. Melati, Lodtunduh, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia

name: Puspa Aman Desa Lodtunduh
address: Jl. Alas Arum, Lodtunduh, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia

name: Martabak telor & terangbulan pandan
address: AA.Gede RAi 1Jl, Kecamatan, Lodtunduh, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1: Delicious. Made fresh to order, pans etc all looked very clean. Efficient friendly service at a great price
review 2: Great dessert and plenty for two. We chose for one terangbulan with chocolate and condense milk. Unfortunately, banana was already sold out when we stopped by.
review 3: Terang Bulan is üòã yummy and the stall owner keeps his stall clean

name: UBUD AGASTYA HOME
address: Jl. A.A. Gede Rai No.13, Lodtunduh, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia

name: Lodtunduh house
address: Jl. A.A. Gede Rai No.21, Lodtunduh, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia

name: Warung Nasi Bali
address: C7Q6+RQQ, Jl. Raya Silungan, Lodtunduh, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia

name: Oka's Gallery
address: Jl. A.A. Gede Rai No.1, Lodtunduh, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1:
Me and my wife chanced upon this place around sunset while roaming around on our motorbike around Ubud, looking for art galleries. We were mesmerised by the beauty of the traditional Balinese house. The owner was a very kind gentle man who gave us a tour of his traditional house and patiently explained the importance of architecture and traditions in Balinese culture. Thank you and best wishes to you and your family! üôèüèº

The neighbourhood has a rustic innocence, with paddy fields around the house and children playing in the fields. We came back with good memories of that beautiful evening.
review 2: We were fortunate to visit this place while there was an artists' gathering. It was wonderful to see the astists at work as well as the paintings in the gallery. The artists were very friendly and approachable. We enjoyed our visit to this place very much.

name: Warung Lawar Legit Lodtunduh
address: C7Q7+R6V, Lodtunduh, Ubud, Gianyar Regency, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 2: Enjoying delicious local food. Food contains pork.
review 3: This is my best choice for local balinese lawar dishes at Ubud, Gianyar. Perfect for lunch or brunch.
review 4: Traditional lawar bali cuisine at cheap price.. Excellent taste.
